description: Verify your Plex accounts and see which servers are available. Search user access across all linked servers with fuzzy matching. Authorize new accounts with a simple flow and complete setup automatically.

capabilities.name: plex_status
capabilities.description: Validates configured Plex accounts and summarizes server availability.

capabilities.name: plex_lookup_user
capabilities.description: Search for Plex user access across all configured servers using fuzzy matching.

capabilities.name: plex_generate_auth_url
capabilities.description: Creates a Plex authentication URL and PIN so you can authorize a new account.

capabilities.name: plex_check_auth_pin
capabilities.description: Polls Plex for the status of an authorization PIN and returns the token when ready.
